name: Bloodmoon Ursaluna
author: Souichirou Gunjima
flavor_text: This special Ursaluna can see in the dark with its left eye and protects itself with mud that is as hard as iron.

abilities.name: Battle-Hardened
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may attach up to 2 Basic {F} Energy cards from your hand to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Mad Bite
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 more damage for each damage counter on your opponent’s Active Pokémon.
